id.comment: Find all statements whose statement number is equal to some constant

query.querystr: stmt s; constant c; Select s with s.stmt# = c.value

id.comment: Find statements that is followed by statement 9

query.querystr: stmt s, s1; Select s such that Follows* (s, s1) with s1.stmt#=9

id.comment: Find read statement that has a variable that is used in a assign statement

query.querystr: variable v, v1; read r; Select r such that Modifies(r, v) with v.varName = "x"

id.comment: Find all variables used both in a read statement and a print statement

query.querystr: variable v, v1; read r; print p; Select v such that Uses(p, v) with r.varName = p.varName

id.comment: Find all assignments that uses a variable and has a variable on the las

query.querystr: variable v,v1; assign a; Select a such that Uses(a, v) pattern a (v1, _)

id.comment: Find all variables used both in a read statement and a print statement

query.querystr: variable v,v1; assign a, a1; Select v1 such that Modifies (a, v) pattern a1 (v1, _)
